class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, arr: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        RreT = []
        ikl = 0
        jmn = 1
        num_foundd = 0
    
        while jmn < len(arr) + k and ikl < len(arr):
            temp_j = jmn
            temp_end = temp_j % len(arr)  
            while arr[temp_end] != arr[temp_end - 1] and (temp_j < (len(arr) + k - 1)):
                temp_j += 1
                temp_end = temp_j % len(arr)


            num_foundd += max(temp_j - ikl - k + 1, 0)
            ikl = temp_j
            jmn = ikl + 1
        return num_foundd
